title: Horror Survival Music Pack 1
description: Horror Survival Music Pack 1 includes:  * Music and ambience perfect for those eerie suspenseful moments.  * Fading music tracks perfect for game trailers and youtube videos.
longDescription:
Horror Survival Music Pack 1 includes: 

* Music and ambience perfect for those eerie suspenseful moments. 

* Fading music tracks perfect for game trailers and youtube videos. 

LISTEN

Seamless looping music tracks included: 

1. Alone - Ambience Loop Version 1 

- Alone - Ambience Loop Version 2 

2. Lost - Full Loop Version 

3. Under the Bed - Ambience Loop Version 


Fading music tracks included: 

1. Alone 

2. Lost 

3. The Encounter 

4. The End or Is It 

5. Under the Bed 

6. Where Am I 


All audio files are .wav 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.
